popt4jlib
Interface RandomChromosomeMakerIntf

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DblArray1CMaker, DblArray1CMaker, DblArray1CMaker, DblArray1CMaker, DblArray1VectorCMaker, DblVarArray1CMaker, IntVarArray1CMaker, IntVarArray1CMaker, IntVarArray1CMaker
public interface RandomChromosomeMakerIntf
extends java.io.Serializable

interface class for constructing random chromosome objects used in meta- heuristics such as GA,EA,PS,MC,SA,BH etc. Extends the java.io.Serializable interface so that implementing objects can be transported across JVMs in distributed computation.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou

          sole method every RandomChromosomeMakerIntf implementation must provide.

createRandomChromosome

public java.lang.Object createRandomChromosome(java.util.HashMap params)
                                        throws OptimizerException
sole method every RandomChromosomeMakerIntf implementation must provide. Each time the method is called, must return a new object (must not re-use previously created arrays etc.)

Parameters:

Object
